data.title: Standard Short Shear + Razorvine Contest
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to force Attackers into an unfavorable position.

data.title: Default B Logs Shear + Razorvine Hold
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to disrupt Attackers from a successful execute towards B Long.

data.title: Spawn Arc Rose B Site Hold Peek
data.description: Enable yourself and your teammates with this strong Arc Rose lineup when holding the site, as it will not blind anyone running out from spawn to fight.

data.title: Standard Short Arc Rose Contest
data.description: When contesting for Short, or simply taking a peek in the mid-round, use this simple lineup to do so.
